text: The Women's 51 kg event at the 2010 South American Games had its semifinals held on March 25 and the final on March 27. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Érica Matos |Paola Benavides |Nupirat Kuja Wachapa Ingrid Valencia |} ==Results== ==References== *Report 51kg W
title: Boxing at the 2010 South American Games – Women's 51kg
